channel.title: How do i do this?
channel.description: people i need help making me a mod or admin with hiyascape source plz help me please!

item.title: How do i do this?
item.dc:creator: @Vanack Vanack
item.description:
@Vanack wrote:

Thats the more complex form. Spidaz, you could just as easily go under the data folder, and add the name to the administrator or moderator notepads.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i do this?
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

umm… what do you mean do you need the commands for it? if not then go to client.java and press ctrl+f type in admin press admin till you see something like this. [code]//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

checkmods();
checkadmins();
checkstaff();
if(checkmods() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") ||
playerRights = 1;
if(checkadmins() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
playerRights = 2;
if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“spidaz”))
playerRights = 3;
[/code]
see the if if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Yournamehere”))[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 14, 2008, 11:52:29 PM[/size][hr]file save after then complie and its done.

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: How do i do this?
item.dc:creator: @Vanack Vanack
item.description:
@Vanack wrote:

Go into the characters folder, and find your name. Open it up with notepad, and find this:

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3016 character-posy = 3341 character-rights = 0 character-ismember = 0 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20080110 character-energy = 100 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 3363

Change it to this:

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3016 character-posy = 3341 character-rights = 3 character-ismember = 0 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20080110 character-energy = 100 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 3363

Change the 0 with player-rights to a 3 for owner, 2 for admin, 1 for moderator, 0 for normal player. 4 is undercover admin.

Read full topic
